info.title: Teku
info.description: A minimal API specification for the beacon node, which enables a validator to connect and perform its obligations on the Ethereum 2.0 phase 0 beacon chain.

get.summary: Get chain genesis details
get.description: Retrieve details of the chain's genesis which can be used to identify chain.

404.description: Chain genesis info is not yet known

get.summary: Get state fork
get.description: Request beacon node to provide all validators that are scheduled to propose a block in the given epoch.

parameters.name: state_id
parameters.description: State identifier. Can be one of: "head" (canonical head in node's view), "genesis", "finalized", "justified", <slot>, <hex encoded stateRoot with 0x prefix>.

503.description: Beacon node is currently syncing and not serving requests

get.summary: Get validator from state
get.description: Returns validator specified by state and id or public key along with status and balance.

parameters.name: state_id
parameters.description: State identifier. Can be one of: "head" (canonical head in node's view), "genesis", "finalized", "justified", <slot>, <hex encoded stateRoot with 0x prefix>.

parameters.name: validator_id
parameters.description: Either hex encoded public key (with 0x prefix) or validator index

503.description: Beacon node is currently syncing and not serving requests

get.summary: Subscribe to node events
get.description: Provides endpoint to subscribe to beacon node Server-Sent-Events stream. Consumers should use [eventsource](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/server-sent-events.html#the-eventsource-interface) implementation to listen on those events.

parameters.name: topics
parameters.description: Event types to subscribe to.Available values: head, block, attestation, voluntary_exit, finalized_checkpoint, chain_reorg

get.summary: Get node health
get.description: Returns node health status in http status codes. Useful for load balancers.

206.description: Node is syncing but can serve incomplete data

503.description: Node not initialized or having issues

get.summary: Get node identity
get.description: Retrieves data about the node's network presence.

200.description: The identifying information of the node.

get.summary: Get node peers
get.description: Retrieves data about the node's network peers.

get.summary: Get node peer
get.description: Retrieves data about the given peer.

get.summary: Get node syncing status
get.description: Requests the beacon node to describe if it's currently syncing or not, and if it is, what block it is up to.

get.summary: Get node version
get.description: similar to [HTTP User-Agent](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-5.5.3).

get.summary: Get attester duties
get.description: Requests the beacon node to provide a set of attestation duties, which should be performed by validators, for a particular epoch. Duties should only need to be checked once per epoch, however a chain reorganization (of > MIN_SEED_LOOKAHEAD epochs) could occur, resulting in a change of duties. For full safety, you should monitor chain reorganizations events.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Validator indexes. Allows comma separated values per field.

503.description: Beacon node is currently syncing and not serving requests

get.summary: Get proposer duties
get.description: Request beacon node to provide all validators that are scheduled to propose a block in the given epoch.

503.description: Beacon node is currently syncing and not serving requests

put.summary: Changes the log level without restarting.
put.description: Changes the log level without restarting. You can change the log level for all logs, or the log level for specific packages or classes.

204.description: The LogLevel was accepted and applied

get.summary: Get the beacon chain block matching the criteria.
get.description: Returns the beacon chain block that matches the specified epoch, slot, or block root.

parameters.name: epoch
parameters.description: `uint64` Epoch number to query.

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: `UInt64` Slot to query in the canonical chain.

parameters.name: root
parameters.description: `Bytes32 Hex` Block root to query.

get.summary: Get information about the chain head.
get.description: Returns information about the head of the beacon chain including the finalized and justified information.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get information about the chain head.
get.description:
Returns information about the head of the beacon chain from the node’s perspective.

To retrieve finalized and justified information, use /beacon/chainhead instead.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get the committee assignments for an epoch.
get.description: Returns committee assignments for each slot in a specified epoch.

parameters.name: epoch
parameters.description: `uint64` Epoch number to query.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get the beacon chain state matching the criteria.
get.description: Returns the beacon chain state that matches the specified slot or root.

parameters.name: root
parameters.description: `Bytes32 Hex` Block root to query.

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: `UInt64` Slot to query in the canonical chain.

parameters.name: stateRoot
parameters.description: `Bytes32 Hex` Block root to query.

404.description: The beacon state matching the supplied query parameter was not found.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get the beacon chain state root for the specified slot.
get.description: Returns the beacon chain state root for the specified slot.

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: `UInt64` Slot to query in the canonical chain.

200.description: The beacon chain `state_root`(`Bytes32`) for the specified slot.

404.description: The beacon state root matching the supplied parameter was not found.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get validators matching the specified query.
get.description:
Returns validator information.

Returns the first page of validators in the current epoch if you do not specify any parameters.

parameters.name: epoch
parameters.description: `uint64` Epoch number to query. Defaults to the current epoch.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description:
Only return validators that are active in the specified `epoch`. By default, returns inactive and active validators.

**Note**: The field accepts any value to return active validators.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: `Integer` The amount of results to return per page. Defaults to 250 results.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: `Integer` Page number to return. Defaults to page 0.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

post.summary: Get validators matching specified public keys.
post.description:
Returns information about validators that match the list of validator public keys and optional epoch.

If no epoch is specified, the validators are queried from the current state.

Public keys that do not match a validator are returned without validator information.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get the listening ENR address of the node.
get.description: Returns the beacon node's listening Ethereum Node Record (ENR) address. Replaced by standard api endpoint `/eth/v1/node/identity`.

200.description: Base64-encoded ENR or an empty string if Node Discovery Protocol v5 is not used.

get.summary: Get the addresses the client's libp2p service is listening on.
get.description: Returns the list of addresses that the client's libp2p service is listening on. Replaced by standard api endpoint `/eth/v1/node/identity`.

get.summary: Get the node PeerId.
get.description: Returns the beacon node's base58-encoded PeerId. Replaced by standard api endpoint `/eth/v1/node/identity`.

get.summary: Get the PeerIds of connected peers.
get.description: Returns the base58-encoded PeerId of each peer connected to the beacon node. Replaced by standard api endpoint `/eth/v1/node/peers`.

get.summary: Get the number of connected peers.
get.description: Returns the number of peers connected to the beacon node. Replaced by standard api endpoint `/eth/v1/node/peers`.

200.description: Number of peers connected to the beacon node.

get.summary: Get the TCP listening port of the client's libp2p service.
get.description: Returns the TCP listening port of the client's libp2p service. Replaced by standard api endpoint `/eth/v1/node/identity`.

get.summary: Get the fork of the current head.
get.description: Returns information about the fork of the beacon chain head from the node’s perspective.Replaced by standard api endpoint /eth/v1/beacon/states/{state_id}/fork

200.description: An object containing the fork of the current head.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get genesis time.
get.description: Returns the genesis time from the beacon node. Replaced by standard api endpoint `/eth/v1/beacon/genesis`.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

get.summary: Get synchronization status.
get.description: Returns an object with data about the synchronization status, or false if not synchronizing. Replaced by standard api endpoint `/eth/v1/node/syncing`.

get.summary: Get client version.
get.description: Returns the client version. Replaced by standard api endpoint `/eth/v1/node/version`.

get.summary: Get the number of attestations in the pool.
get.description: Returns the number of pending attestations in the current pool.

200.description: Number of pending attestations in the pool.

get.summary: Get an unsigned attestation for a slot from the current state.
get.description:
Returns an unsigned attestation for the block at the specified non-finalized slot.

This endpoint is not protected against slashing. Signing the returned attestation can result in a slashable offence.

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: `uint64` Non-finalized slot for which to create the attestation.

parameters.name: committee_index
parameters.description: `Integer` Index of the committee making the attestation.

200.description: Returns an attestation object with a blank signature. The `signature` field should be replaced by a valid signature.

404.description: An attestation could not be created for the specified slot.

post.description:
Submit a signed attestation to the beacon node to be validated and submitted if valid.

This endpoint does not protected against slashing. Signing the attestation can result in a slashable offence.

204.description: The Attestation was accepted, validated, and submitted

get.summary: Create and return an unsigned beacon block at the specified slot.
get.description: Create and return an unsigned beacon block at the specified slot. The `randao_reveal` and `slot` must be provided to create the block.

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: `uint64` Slot in which to create the beacon block.

parameters.name: randao_reveal
parameters.description: `BLSSignature Hex` BLS12-381 signature for the current epoch.

parameters.name: graffiti
parameters.description: `Bytes32 Hex` Graffiti.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

post.summary: Submit a signed transaction to be imported.
post.description: Submit a signed beacon block to the beacon node to be imported. The beacon node performs the required validation.

200.description: Block has been successfully broadcast, validated and imported.

202.description: Block has been successfully broadcast, but failed validation and has not been imported.

500.description: Beacon node experienced an internal error.

get.summary: Aggregates all attestations matching given attestation data root and slot.
get.description: Aggregates all attestations matching given attestation data root and slot.

parameters.name: attestation_data_root
parameters.description: `String` HashTreeRoot of AttestationData that validator wants aggregated.

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: `uint64` Non-finalized slot for which to create the aggregation.

200.description: Returns aggregated `Attestation` object with same `AttestationData` root.

403.description: Beacon node was not assigned to aggregate on that subnet

post.summary: Get the validator duties for the specified epoch.
post.description:
Returns the validator duties for validators that match the specified public keys and epoch.

Public keys that do not match a validator are returned without validator information.
Deprecated - use`/eth/v1/validator/duties/attester/{epoch}` and `/eth/v1/validator/duties/proposer/{epoch}` instead.

200.description: List of validators, including information about a validator's attestation committee index and block proposal slot.

204.description: No content may be returned if the genesis block has not been set, meaning that there is no head to query.

post.summary: Verifies given aggregate and proof and publishes it on appropriate gossipsub topic.
post.description: Aggregates all attestations matching given attestation data root and slot.

post.summary: Subscribe beacon node to committee attestation subnet.
post.description:
After Beacon node receives this request it has to:
- add subnet to ENR
- announce subnet topic subscription on gossipsub
- search using discv5 for peers related to this subnet and replace current peers with those ones if neccessary
- aggregate attestations received on that subnet

200.description: Slot signature is valid and beacon node is subscribed to given committee attestation subnet.

post.summary: Subscribe beacon node persistently to a list of subnets.

genesis_time.description: The genesis_time configured for the beacon node, which is the unix time in seconds at which the Eth2.0 chain began.

activation_eligibility_epoch.description: When criteria for activation were met.

activation_epoch.description: Epoch when validator activated. 'FAR_FUTURE_EPOCH' if not activated.

exit_epoch.description: Epoch when validator exited. 'FAR_FUTURE_EPOCH' if not exited.

withdrawable_epoch.description: When validator can withdraw or transfer funds. 'FAR_FUTURE_EPOCH' if not defined.

index.description: Index of validator in validator registry.

peer_id.description: Cryptographic hash of a peer’s public key. [Read more](https://docs.libp2p.io/concepts/peer-id/)

p2p_addresses.description: Node's addresses on which eth2 rpc requests are served. [Read more](https://docs.libp2p.io/reference/glossary/#multiaddr)

discovery_addresses.description: Node's addresses on which is listening for discv5 requests. [Read more](https://docs.libp2p.io/reference/glossary/#multiaddr)

seq_number.description: Uint64 starting at 0 used to version the node's metadata. If any other field in the local MetaData changes, the node MUST increment seq_number by 1.

attnets.description: Bitvector representing the node's persistent attestation subnet subscriptions.

peer_id.description: Cryptographic hash of a peer’s public key. '[Read more](https://docs.libp2p.io/concepts/peer-id/)

enr.description: Ethereum node record. Not currently populated. [Read more](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-778)

sync_distance.description: How many slots node needs to process to reach head. 0 if synced.

version.description: A string which uniquely identifies the client implementation and its version; similar to [HTTP User-Agent](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-5.5.3).

pubkey.description: The validator's BLS public key, uniquely identifying them. 48-bytes, hex encoded with 0x prefix, case insensitive.

validator_index.description: Index of validator in validator registry

slot.description: The slot at which the validator must attest.

pubkey.description: The validator's BLS public key, uniquely identifying them. 48-bytes, hex encoded with 0x prefix, case insensitive.

validator_index.description: Index of validator in validator registry

slot.description: The slot at which the validator must propose block.
